revised_title: Researches on the Impregnation of the Ovum in Amphibia and Early Stages of Embryo Development
tldr: The author, George Newport, investigates the impregnation of the ovum in amphibians and the early stages of embryo development. He describes his methods for observing the penetration of the spermatozoon into the egg and provides detailed observations of the process. This research contributes to the understanding of fertilization and early development in amphibians.
